HEADLINE: Transcript of conference call held with analysts & investors on 11th November 2022

In terms of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform that a conference call was held on 11th November 2022, wherein the management of Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL) discussed the company''s results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2022 with analysts and investors
